Action.author: guoger
Action.body: with {{MaxMessageCount = 500}}, difference in {{MaxInflightMsgs}} doesn't have much impact on result. (still running locally on OSX)

Action.author: yacovm
Action.body: I think it shouldn't be a high value. I'd say even 5 suffices. Moreover, if we pour too many blocks into the network, we might overflow the leader's egress buffers and it would start dropping messages. Ultimately, having too many outstanding blocks i*n the transmission buffers* isn't a good thing in my opinion.
